entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • DynamicDependency to property doesn't work with NativeAOT #75994
    8.0.0
  • JIT does not eliminate null check for "o ??= new()" #75987
    Future
  • No runtime error raised while using Generics of an unreferenced class #75984
  • [Feature Request] System.Text.Json: Built-in Converter of Serializing/Deserializing generic ObservableCollection<T> properties of custom classes #75977
  • Issue in ECDsaCertificateExtensions.CopyWithPrivateKey with TPM #75971
  • [WASM] Check if we can still skip GC critical method check in WASM #75970
    8.0.0
  • Pthread assert failures on Arm64 Hisilicon D05 #75968
  • Quality Week: Replace pkgprojs with NuGet Pack task based projects #75966
    8.0.0
  • Sharing GC.dll for NativeAOT executables #75964
    Future
  • [wasm][debugger] Add object inheritance tests with different JMC settings #75959
    8.0.0
  • AdvSimd.Arm64.LoadPairVector128 has additional stack usage #75957
    8.0.0
  • Microsoft.XmlSerializer.Generator copies results to $(OutputPath) not $(OutDir) #75956
  • Kerberos Authentication failure in HTTP Client in Linux (.NET6) #75951
  • Windows server 2016, Windows 10: Whether this C# API System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader uses MSEVEN6 Protocol under the hood or not? #75949
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: XXH3 #75948
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] IndexOutOfRangeException when running under perfview #75945
    8.0.0
  • Test failure baseservices\\exceptions\\unittests\\RecursiveThrowNew\\RecursiveThrowNew.cmd #75944
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\X86\\Avx1\\ConvertToVector_ro\\ConvertToVector_ro.cmd #75942
    7.0.0
  • Test failure GC/Features/HeapExpansion/bestfit/bestfit.sh #75941
    7.0.0

Closed

  • ThreadNative StartInner needs to handle return values from StartThread #13327
    Future
  • Cross-Compilation from Arm64 to x64 fails on M1 Mac #74973
    8.0.0
  • Remove redundant initialization to keep consistent style #75893
    8.0.0
  • Undocumented 7.0 APIs in System.Security #72401
    7.0.0
  • Expression.Compile performance regression on .NET7 RC1 #75891
    7.0.0
  • SIGABRT_libcoreclr.so!CorUnix::CPalObjectBase::ReleaseReference #7125
    Future
  • Host can stop when it knows all IHostedServices stopped #75972
  • [Analyzer] Prevent behavioral change in built-in operators for IntPtr and UIntPtr #74022
    7.0.0
  • System.Reflection work planned for .NET 7 #44655
    7.0.0
  • ToString() MMM_Specifier Broken #75950
  • System.Text.Json source generator fails with two nested classes of the same name #75926
  • Binary search on SortedSet/Dict #74934
    Future
  • [wasm] Test failure Dispose_DisposingHandlerCancelsActiveOperationsWithoutResponses - ERR_CONTENT_LENGTH_MISMATCH #58812
    Future
  • [wasm][debugger] Object members that are protected accessors are not displayed in debugger window even though proxy is informed about them #75778
    7.0.0
  • JIT: IEnumerable<string>isinst String[] should be inlined #75815
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Issue #75070 - Add PriorityQueue DequeueEnqueue Method #75993
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: properly update trees in optOptimizeBoolsGcStress #75992
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: improve scalability of optReachable #75990
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add overloads to ReadFromJsonAsync #75989
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Update solution files under src/libraries #75988
    area-Meta
  • [wasm][debugger] Support create, debugging and running wasmbrowser template from VS #75986
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/7.0] Enable doc generation for source-build #75985
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove hardcoded limit in deserialization constructor arguments #75982
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Add missing DynamicallyAccessMembers attributes to System.Data.Common/ref #75980
    area-System.Data, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/7.0] Flow internal transport packages during servicing #75979
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/7.0] Update RateLimiting ref assembly #75978
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Update area owners #75975
    area-Meta
  • Clean-up InteropServices.JavaScript project file #75962
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [wasm][debugger] Remove `JToken` properties that are for internal use only #75958
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Clean up of SPC to match ref assembly public surface for Mono and CoreCLR #75954
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix critical finalization test #75952
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm] Fix errors being logged multiple times #75947
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Configuring Console Json Formatting with JsonWriterOptions doesn't work with Trimming #75943
    area-Extensions-Logging

Merged

  • Enable logging managed stack trace for AV to event log #75721
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fail-fast on SuspendThread/ResumeThread failures #75845
    area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • Enable doc generation for source-build #75981
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix x64 cross build on arm64 macOS #75677
    os-mac-os-x, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Make initialization more consistent in `gc.cpp` #75908
    area-GC-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add missing DynamicallyAccessMembers attributes to System.Data.Common/ref #75961
    area-System.Data, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Update RateLimiting ref assembly #75976
    area-System.Threading
  • Allow Hardware Intrinsics to work with the AltJit #75912
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix a rare crash when creating or opening named mutexes #75843
    area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • Skip ASN.1 SetOf sorting if nothing to sort #75928
    tenet-performance, area-System.Formats.Asn1
  • [NativeAOT] Use clock_gettime_nsec_np if available in GCToOSInterface::GetLowPrecisionTimeStamp #75862
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix visibility modifier inconsistency in TextFieldParser #75974
    area-Microsoft.VisualBasic, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add missing inheritdocs references to IParsable.TryParse #75856
    area-System.Numerics
  • Flow internal transport packages during servicing #75969
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/7.0] Fix public key token of Serialization.Schema contract assembly #75973
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove a few ToCharArray uses from System.Private.Xml #75946
    area-System.Xml
  • Optimize AwayFromZero rounding #74935
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Bump intellisense package for main to include latest comments for Numerics #75937
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Bump intellisense package for RC2 to include latest comments for Numerics #75938
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix public key token of Serialization.Schema contract assembly #75963
    area-Serialization
  • [release/7.0] Fix servicing failures when building coreclr nuget packages #75899
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [wasm] update README #75960
  • Fix WASI README.md typo #75953
    area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] enable issue 58812 #75444
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Removed internalProperties group. #75904
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Faster "obj is T[]" for sealed T #75816
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add markdown readme for Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Json #75876
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Don't use MS.Build.NoTargets SDK for runtime tests #75939
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Remove unused configuration values #75911
    area-VM-coreclr

Updated

  • Memory model document. #75790
    area-Meta, memory model
  • Make sure we at least sweep the loh even when we wanted to compact it #74626
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [Mono] Restore old code to solve the recent SpanHelpers regressions #75917
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance
  • Ensure regions never use more than 99% of the heap hard limit #75038
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix numeric IntPtr behavioral changes analyzer findings #75557
    area-Meta
  • Initialization failures logging #75097
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Adding EVEX encoding support for emitOutputRRR(). #75934
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [WIP] Support hot cold splitting in crossgen2 #74963
    NO-MERGE, area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Remove XmlConvert.StrEqual and use Span<char>.StartsWith() instead. #74955
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Improvements to CoreCLR Building, Debugging, and Testing Documentation #75569
    documentation, area-Meta
  • [release/7.0-rc2] [Mono] Restore old code to solve the recent SpanHelpers regressions #75932
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Memory
  • source-build: support building runtime using non-portable runtime packages. #75597
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Preserve last error for patchpoint helpers #75922
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Enable CI for macOS x64/arm64 #75421
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Enable IDE0060 (Remove unused parameter) analyzer #72667
    area-Meta
  • [JIT] CodeGen verification testing #75102
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Allocate RuntimeType objects on Frozen Object Heap #75573
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [No Review, WIP] Consume ApiCompat's ValidateAssemblies task #73263
    NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove locks from COM events delegate management. #75863
    area-Interop-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Resolve constrained static virtual calls in gshared methods. #75839
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Add debugger display for huge BigInteger #75796
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Initial unification of DynamicMethod to be shareable between runtimes #75829
    area-CoreLib-mono
  • Implement IEEE754 totalOrder comparer #75517
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Delete `GTF_VAR_CAST` #74461
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Update compiler build #75935
  • [tests] Skip XslCompiledTransformApi tests on iOS, tvOS, and when testing native AOT #75730
  • Improve IPAddress to/from bytes perf #75872
    area-System.Net
  • Fix Dictionary perf regression for non-string ref type keys #75663
    area-System.Collections, tenet-performance
  • Add the ability to start and stop IHostedService instances concurrently #75894
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Extend RuntimeHelpers.IsBitwiseEquatable to more types #75640
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • ActivatorUtilities not depending on ctor order for creating instances #75846
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • emit branchless form of (i >= 0 && j >= 0)/(i!=0&& j!= 0) for signed integers #62689
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Use UTF8 encoding on Tar string fields #75902
    area-System.IO
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc2' => 'release/7.0' #75913
  • Remove closed issues from issues.targets #75363
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Support running Reflection tests within Visual Studio #75915
    area-System.Reflection, test-enhancement, 8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Devirtualize ldarg(s)+callvirt where possible. #75748
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Added snake and kebab naming policies to JSON serializer #69613
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Arm64: Add If conversion pass #73472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • remove explicit LangVersion from a few projects #75806
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Dummy commit #75920
    NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Publish hostcommon static library #75858
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Make WriteCommentValue() overloads have same behavior; Make the Utf8JsonWriter always insert newlines between the end of comments and the start of arrays or objects #75074
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Add char[] buffer to XmlRawWriter. #75411
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Set names to runtime internal threads #75113
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Only R2R blittable IL stubs that aren't inlined #75793
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, needs-author-action, 8.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • apicompat/tool: log message to explain how to generate suppressions #28083
  • [cli] install exact version of a package #28075
  • Remove obsolete suppressions when re-generating suppression files #28070
    8.0.1xx
  • Preserve xml comments when re-generating the suppression file #28069
  • [NetSDKE2E][Loc]With version17.4.0 preview 3.0 + .net7 rc2 SDK installed on locale OS, some template names are unlocalized after running "dotnet new --list" in CLI . #28068
  • Breaking change in linebreak handling in 7.0 RC1 #28084
  • The DynamicMethod.CreateDelegate throws InvalidProgramException #28063

Closed

  • interactive restore failing in latest net7 sdks #27597
    7.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'main' #28062
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Gate warnings for localization asset locales on TFM >= 7 #28060
    Servicing-approved, Area-NetSDK, 7.0.1xx
  • MSBuild on .NET 7: Downgrade compile-time references (#28079) #28090
    Area-Infrastructure
  • MSBuild on .NET 7: Downgrade compile-time references #28079
  • Add more mapping tests #28037
    Area-ApiCompat
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'main' #27916
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • [Backport] Fix Property Parsing in Publish #28061
  • Fix Property Parsing in Publish #28059
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Revert "do not emit diagnostic when attribute argument is internal type" #27774
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Read PackageDefinitions and PackageDependencies from the cache assets file instead of ResolvePackageDependencies #28057
  • Avoid extra copies of dotnet-watch build outputs in the SDK directory #27964
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-Watch
  • Use architecture specific DOTNET_ROOT variable name #27566
    Area-Infrastructure, feature-dotnetwatch, Area-CLI, Area-Watch
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2000244 #27667
  • Handle test parser forwarded args #27961
    Area-DotNet Test, Area-CLI, cli-ux, 7.0.1xx
  • [`dotnet-new`] Add inRoot option for AddProjectsToSolutionPostAction #27986
    area: dotnet new

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-21
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Partial properties #6420
  • [Proposal]: Change ref safety errors to warnings in unsafe contexts #6476
  • [Proposal]: Implicit parameters #6300

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • False IDE0059 message #64198
  • Switch pattern matching with throwing default returns object with wrong boxed datatype #64196
  • Tests failing due to MessagePack on 32-bit debug builds only #64195
  • Create email aliases for specific infraswat roles #64191
    17.5
  • An assert is thrown for an erroneous code using out var #64189
  • Update vs to Version 17.4.0 Preview 2.0 from PREVIEW 1 cause errors in publish worker service #64184
  • IntelliSense doesn't work for interface statics when dotting a type parameter #64182
  • Compiler unnecessarily guards readonly object when locking. #64178
  • [Proposal] Extensions to `file_header_template` in EditorConfig #64177
  • Source generator exceptions should be shown as errors, rather than warnings #64175
  • Lack of a fresh Roslyn version in the Mono project #64174
  • Confusing error message mentioning `WindowsRuntime` when trying to await an `IAsyncEnumerable` #64170
  • [LSP] Document highlighting throws exception with F# files #64169
  • [LSP] Enable support for F# semantic classifications #64168

Closed

  • Change RTRS default escape to ReturnOnly #64122
    17.4
  • Generator types are sometimes being loaded twice #63189
    17.4
  • "Scoped" word is forbidden since MSBuild version 17.3.0+92e077650 #63469
    17.4

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge main into features/solutionEvents #64202
    Area-Compilers
  • Emit `[module: RefSafetyRules]` attribute only if the module contains type declarations #64201
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • TextLoader method override detection #64192
    Area-IDE
  • Add ScopedKind to IParameterSymbol and ILocalSymbol #64190
    Area-Compilers
  • Update localization-suggestion.md #64187
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use warnings for escape analysis in unsafe context #64186
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Fix confusing `ref` usage error messages #64183
    Area-Compilers
  • Format parameters as names in error messages #64179
    Area-Compilers
  • Reduce GetTypeByMetadataName allocations for fail-path #64176
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Try to reduce JIT costs for AbstractLogAggregator #64172
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Remove the ILegacyWorkspaceDescriptor concept #64161
    Area-IDE
  • Skip some tests that are currently failing on debug 32-bit #64199
    Area-Compilers, Test, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64197
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Change RSTE of RTRS to ReturnOnly by default #64152
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, Next
  • Switch to main thread before calling TryApplyChanges #64194
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Deprecate usage of Workspace in TextLoader (breaking change) #63616
    Area-IDE, Needs API Review, 17.4
  • Merge main to features/solutionEvents #64167
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64188
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fix CI badges #64193
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Fix regression in error list updates #64180
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64185
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64181
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Improve SymbolDisplay to handle operator symbols that are not valid operators for the target language. #64109
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators, Next
  • Fix parsing of lambda parameter named "scoped" #64085
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Cherrypick for 17.3: Fix potential deadlock if we are previewing a rename change #64159
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64171
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64165
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/CLaSP #64166
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Switch to messagepack serialization/deserialization for our ID types #64135
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/solutionEvents #64206
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/CLaSP #64205
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64203
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add multiple language support to stack trace explorer #64204
    Area-IDE
  • use xunit apis for test discovery #64156
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Introduce the new EA extensibility points for UnitTesting to actually implement/export to light up in the forked solution crawler. #64164
    Area-IDE
  • Compiler outputs #63882
    Area-Compilers
  • Use workspace services to implement test hooks #64158
    Area-IDE
  • Disable quickinfo on new inline rename #63907
    Area-IDE
  • Refactor RunTests #63948
    Area-IDE, Area-Infrastructure, Infraswat
  • Add a completion list filter for enum member #64054
    Area-IDE
  • Remove unused value assignment lambda capture case #62057
    Area-IDE
  • Inline Diagnostics TaggerDelay #56354
    Area-IDE
  • Utilise `PooledObjects.ArrayList(Of T)' in Features\LanguageServices #55988
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Fixed nullable warning for "change cast type" refactoring #64080
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Check generic containing attribute types #64006
    Area-Compilers
  • don't run compiler-only tests unless there is a compiler change #64163
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • TR @onclick only after tabbed #44112
  • Blazor Wasm ASP.NET Core Hosted IWebHostEnvironment.WebRootPath null when debugging #44110
  • Using Lottie in Blazor #44109
  • SPA running under IIS go to 503 but w3wp dont stop #44108
  • [Blazor] `Input*` - allow correct async handling of `ValueChanged` callbacks (incl. `@bind-Value:after`) #44105
  • [NetSDKE2E][Loc]With VS 17.4 preview 3 + NET7 RC2 installed on Local OS, the template "ASP.NET Core with React.js and Redux" is inconsistent with EN's template in dotnet new --list. #44104
  • Perf regression: plainTextWithFilter #44103
  • Should a required array bound to query string throw an exception when omitted? #44102
  • Opensource but why has not source? #44101
    Discussions

Closed

  • egrep are obsolescent now. use grep -E instead #44106
  • [Blazor] Blazor App Randomly Freezes #44098
  • Simplify authentication setups with a defaultSchemeSelector overload #42834
    Discussions
  • dot.net #44111
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Owin.OwinEnvironment doesn't implement CopyTo which breaks owin's UseErrorPage #44082
    8.0-preview1
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_nodejs, plaintext #44043
  • Perf regression: mapaction, mvc, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #44080

PullRequests

Merged

  • Implement OwinEnvironment.CopyTo and add Tests - Fixes #44082 #44099
    community-contribution, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • [release/7.0] Change gRPC JSON to only accept top-level field as request body #44055
    Servicing-consider, area-grpc, 7.0.0
  • Nullable cleanup #43451
    area-web-frameworks
  • Annotate WebAssembly.Authentication for nullability #43442
    area-blazor
  • Fix DetectMisplacedLambdaAttribute analyzer and tests #44061
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure
  • Use perfect-hash in HttpUriScheme.GetKnownMethod(string) instead of trie #44096
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2000252 #43956
    area-infrastructure
  • [6.0] Allow zero byte reads on the test server response body #44020
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • Rolling back SDK to last stable version to fix builds #44087
    area-infrastructure
  • Route tooling redux #44077

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet-dump collect process crash. Unable to read beyond the end of the stream. #3401
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • Revert squashed commit and re-merge #3403
  • Merge main into release/stable #3332

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Runs in Windows Emulator, Throws System.NullReferenceException error in Android Emulator. Don't know where to start. #10249
  • Bug with WebView #10246
    Backlog
  • Updating Microsoft.WindowsAppSDK to 1.2 experimental breaks Titles on Shell #10244
    Backlog
  • Navigation not working on Windows #10241
  • Size not calculated properly when invoking UseMauiCompatibility method in MauiProgram #10238
    Backlog
  • Unable to record custom aot profile. #10237
    Backlog
  • AOT everything is not AOTing everything #10236
    Backlog
  • NavigationView cannot be null with navigation in modal #10235
    Backlog
  • Unable to build a project with net7 RC 1 #10234
    .NET 7 Planning

Closed

  • await Shell.Current.GoToAsync(sPageName) results in An unhandled win32 exception occurred in [41992] #10084
  • Entry.Completed and Entry.ReturnCommand not executed #8960
    7.0-rc2
  • EF Core with Sqlite throws System.ExecutionEngineException running on iOS Device (Release) #9176

PullRequests

Created

  • [Windows] Updated used ListViewItem style (avoid CornerRadius etc) #10250

Merged

  • [Android] Don't null binding context when recycling items #10245
  • [Windows] Fix issue with items not filling horizontal space in CollectionView #10243
  • [Android] Fire Completed event using ReturnType.Search #9632
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 7.0-rc2
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #10232
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • [android] bring back `$(AndroidLinkResources)` by default #10153
    platform/android 🤖, area/app-size 🤏, area/perf 🏎️, 7.0
  • [iOS] Implement IsEnabled property on Editor #7611
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 7.0
  • Fix SwitchCell not compliant with best accessibility practices #6899
    area/a11y, community ✨, 7.0

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add FormattableString FromSql to Cosmos #29177
  • Consider doing split query on a reference navigation if the other side is a collection #29174
    Backlog

Closed

  • Query filter in including relation #29175
  • Add-Migration hangs after build succeeds in VS 2019 and VS 2022 #29083

PullRequests

Created

  • Update XML documentation for SQL query APIs #29178

Updated

  • Translate DateTimeOffset.ToUnixTime[Seconds|Milliseconds] #28978
    blocked
  • [release/3.1] Move to Ubuntu 22.04 #29157
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] Move to Ubuntu 22.04 - missed parts #29159
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [17.4 Preview 2.1] the underlying connection was closed: could not establish trust relationship #14562
  • [17.4 Community Preview 2.1] SDK Resolver Failure #14561
  • [17.4 preveiw2.1] Can not log-in in VS IDE #14560

Closed

  • Installer says VS 17.0 is OK, download page says it requires 17.4 #14521
    .NET 7.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix MS.Extensions versions in dotnet-format #14566

Merged

  • [release/7.0.1xx] Patch out entrypoint warning in F# as a temporary workaround. #14565
  • [release/7.0.1xx-rc2] Patch out entrypoint warning in F# as a temporary workaround. #14564
  • Update Download MSFT sdk Tarball CI step to handle rtm in version # #14558

Updated

  • Initial change to enable onelocbuild. Add ids to all of the strings in the html files. #14557
  • Switch repo to use native AzDO container support #14541
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'main' #14556
  • [WIP] Eliminate portable runtime build. #14549
  • Add Alpine CI for source-build #14417
